metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: o Sauté diced onion in olive oil until softened.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Mix freekeh with sautéed onion, chopped parsley, and mint. o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Rinse freekeh and cook in water until tender, then drain.
